title: Wow leblanc is so freaking OP!
body:
meanwhile freelo fuck veigar 

https://i.gyazo.com/d37627f64fd9aa1b060d403c11630972.gif

replies.body:
Leblanc died SO fast, her clone didn't even realize it until a second later.

Clone: HAHAHHA! TRY TO GUESS WHICH ONE IS THE RE--....oh, she's dead *******poof*******
Logged in to upvote lmaooo :D
"OH THE IRONY IS THICK!!!" - Wraith King
Am I the only one who dreams of an ironic situation involving an iron? So that you can scream OH THE IRONY!
Veigar has the right to do that. Since its all he can pretty much do anymore :(

{{champion:45}}  I AM EVIL! 




STOP LAUGHING!
No, you kill a leblanc and you are a hero.
{{champion:126}} : I was the first hero.... {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

did you kill a leblanc?
Yes: you are a hero and savior to all of man/yordle kind.
No: Do it.
die noxian weakling
She's hot though :P

{{champion:45}} is evil. He feels no such emotions.


Shut up {{champion:117}} I AM EVIL

Nevermind that 3 lv advantage Veigar has, the fact Lb is probably underfed, and that Vivi probably has a good bit of AP under his belt :P.  That said people don't really bitch about Vivi's burst because he's immobile, really fucking squishy, and his most damaging ability is really short range. That and his general weakness to highly mobile assassins who can kill him before he blinks.

Shut up dont ruin it.

This is amazing and beautiful.

> [{quoted}](name=Ashe cat,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=OEqERtyk,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-06-05T02:27:14.617+0000)
>
> Nevermind that 3 lv advantage Veigar has, the fact Lb is probably underfed, and that Vivi probably has a good bit of AP under his belt :P.  That said people don't really bitch about Vivi's burst because he's immobile, really fucking squishy, and his most damaging ability is really short range. That and his general weakness to highly mobile assassins who can kill him before he blinks.

3 level advantage?

Leblanc was 15 and Veigar was 16.. that's not 3, m8
Prob misread 16 as 18, it does look like the gif was made with a potatoe.
Did someone say Potato?
I think they meant "Walrus".

# URF2016Confirmed
That would be funny if I'd actually said manatee...
**URFEVOLUTION**
^ this lol. Thought it was just a blurry 18 lol. That aside, most of the point stands lol.

That said people don't really bitch about Vivi's burst because he's immobile, really fucking squishy, and his most damaging ability is really short range. That and his general weakness to highly mobile assassins who can kill him before he blinks.

\>not understanding the thread in the slightest
That's a terrible Leblanc btw, one does not simply walk into a Veigar.
Do you realize vegar r has more range than lb q?

> [{quoted}](name=Llanite,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=OEqERtyk,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2015-06-05T04:21:32.750+0000)
>
> Do you realize vegar r has more range than lb q?

LeBlanc Q actually has 50 more range.

Nevermind that Veigar's ult deals more damage based on the targets AP.
And what is LB good at?  Hmm....
Well leblanc didin't have time to land her combo on veiger because his ult instakilled her because she clearly had a shitload of ap
You missed the part where you show us how much AP LeBlanc had from killing Veigar's teammates over and over again.

> [{quoted}](name=DrCyanide,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=OEqERtyk,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-06-05T01:39:29.022+0000)
>
> You missed the part where you show us how much AP LeBlanc had from killing Veigar's teammates over and over again.

she only had like ~450 AP or something lol

> [{quoted}](name=Sadistic Veigar,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=OEqERtyk,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-06-05T01:43:31.039+0000)
>
> she only had like ~450 AP or something lol

So that's... 360 extra damage. Plus the base 500 damage from Veigar equaling 860. How much AP did Veigar have? Because, that would mean he would have to have about 700+ AP to do that. Anything else won't add up unless somehow that LeBlanc had (somehow) negative magic resist.
Omg noob you should've silenced him before he can burst you :^)

Yeah, silly leblanc. She should have known how veigar's ult works and built AD instead.

In all seriousness though, the leblanc was an idiot for walking into a veigar with a rank 3 ult like she did.

{{champion:7}} {{item:3078}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3110}} {{item:3102}} 
Who's laughing now?

> [{quoted}](name=SlytherinUmbreon,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=OEqERtyk,comment-id=000e0000,timestamp=2015-06-05T15:54:18.007+0000)
>
> {{champion:7}} {{item:3078}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3110}} {{item:3102}} 
> Who's laughing now?

I wonder why people haven't tried this build.
They have, sort of. I stole  it from Piglet. (sort of, he used Static Shiv instead of BotRK)
him being 16 also means his ult is lvl3
http://i0.kym-cdn.com/entries/icons/facebook/000/006/077/so_good.png

That's the exact reason he's shit. I mean, you can't do stuff like that and expect to not be gutted in other aspects. He permanently scales his AP, his ultimate just like any other casters ultimate does massive damage, AND does extra based on the enemy's AP. Ofcourse the rest of his kit's gonna be shit with such an overloaded ability. 

My point is not that veigar's broken, but his kit revolves too much around just point and click everything to whomever's unlucky enough to get stunned. So in order for the enemies to not feel like shit whenever veigar initiates his point-and-click Q.T.E. he got dumpstered in many aspects.

By the way that R did like, 1800 damage?

> [{quoted}](name=Ironhold,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=OEqERtyk,comment-id=0014,timestamp=2015-06-05T13:25:31.566+0000)
>
> That's the exact reason he's shit. I mean, you can't do stuff like that and expect to not be gutted in other aspects. He permanently scales his AP, his ultimate just like any other casters ultimate does massive damage, AND does extra based on the enemy's AP. Ofcourse the rest of his kit's gonna be shit with such an overloaded ability. 
> 
> My point is not that veigar's broken, but his kit revolves too much around just point and click everything to whomever's unlucky enough to get stunned. So in order for the enemies to not feel like shit whenever veigar initiates his point-and-click Q.T.E. he got dumpstered in many aspects.
> 
> By the way that R did like, 1800 damage?

Point and click everything? His only targeted ability is his ult now.
I think he's talking about pre-rework Veigar
He has as much Point and Click in his kit as {{champion:34}}
I watched it 5 times. Just to see her die
No one's going to believe me on this but I've always hated Veigar longer and deeper than Leblanc
only difference is it takes 30 minutes to get there
And kids this is why you should always have 1 defensive item such as {{item:3102}}
Everyone's looking at LB getting 1-shot, but I'm still sitting here looking at LB landing that chain which was a 100% miss

how?
the skill shot is as wide as the chains head animation.;
Therefor it hits.
Why i don't think half the people who play against leblanc actually understand that.
lol
It's not the middle of the skillshot that matters, its the head or the hitbox.
Since landing max range happens alot more often than close range.
